helps.text:
Converted to standard Envy 1.x by Jason Huang (god@sure.net)
Further conversion to Rom 2.4 by Jaceks and Chicken's Den Staff

mobiles.name: black pawn
mobiles.short_description: the Pawn of the Black Court
mobiles.long_description: You see a pawn standing here waiting for orders.
mobiles.description:
The Black Pawn looks quite like a small knight without his powerful steed.
His armor is shiny and black. He stands ready to give his life for the Crown.

mobiles.name: white pawn
mobiles.short_description: the Pawn of the White Court
mobiles.long_description: You see a pawn standing here waiting for orders.
mobiles.description:
The White Pawn looks quite like a small knight without his powerful steed.
His armor is spotless and white. He stands ready to give his life for the 
Crown.

mobiles.name: black rook castle
mobiles.long_description: In the corner you see a large, black, stone castle on wheels.
mobiles.description:
The Black Rook is a very large man-made tomb on wheels.  Just
from the looks of it, it will probably be YOUR tomb.

mobiles.name: white rook castle
mobiles.long_description: In the corner you see a large, white, stone castle on wheels.
mobiles.description:
The White Rook is a very large man-made tomb on wheels.  Just
from the looks of it, it will probably be YOUR tomb.

mobiles.name: black knight
mobiles.long_description: Here stands a magnificent knight of the dark realm.
mobiles.description:
The Black Knight is here, riding his ebony black war horse.  His eyes
flash behind his visor in vengence.

mobiles.name: white knight
mobiles.long_description: Here stands a magnificent knight of the light realm.
mobiles.description:
The White Knight is here, riding his ivory white war horse.  His eyes
gleam behind his visor in joy.

mobiles.name: black bishop priest
mobiles.description:
The Black Bishop seems willing to help you straight into your grave so
he can bless you properly.

mobiles.name: white bishop priest
mobiles.description:
The White Bishop seems willing to help you in any possible so that he can
attain a higher spirituality.

mobiles.name: black queen
mobiles.description:
The Black Queen is a strikingly beautiful woman with pale skin and a mass of
dark hair that crowns her head like a black cloud.  If looks could kill, you
would already be dead.

mobiles.name: white queen
mobiles.description:
The White Queen is a stunningly beautiful woman with dark skin and a mass
of light hair that frames her head like the sun.  This is surely love at
first sight for you.

mobiles.name: black king
mobiles.description:
The Black King is a menacing figure.  You can easily understand why he
is the king and you are not.

mobiles.name: white king
mobiles.description:
The White King is a stately figure.  You can easily understand why he
is the king and you are not.

mobiles.name: caliph omar ghost
mobiles.long_description: The Ghost of Caliph Omar is floating here.
mobiles.description:
Caliph Omar was person who sanctions chess for islamic people. 
His ghost is here small, and looks like made from smoke.

rooms.name: The Great Chessboard Of Midgaard
rooms.description:
You stand in the archway of the Chessboard of Midgaard.  The giant
wooden gate is rusted open.
   A narrow dirt path leads eastwards into the thick grass and the
chessboard opens up to the west.
     There is a small (Glowing) (Huming) tablet.

exits.exit_description: A dirt path leads away through the great field north of Midgaard.
The huge chessboard opens up to the west.

rooms.name: A White Square
rooms.description:
You are standing on a white marble square.  This is usually the home
of the Black Queen's Rook.

exits.exit_description: A black square lies to the east.
A black square lies to the south.

rooms.description:

of the Black Queen's Knight.

A white square lies to the west.

of the White King's Rook.

exits.exit_description: A black square lies to the north.
A black square lies to the west.

rooms.name: The Black Treasury
rooms.description:
You are standing in the treasury of the Black Court.  Hopefully no one
has looted the Crown's treasure.

exits.exit_description: A small staircase rises above you.

rooms.name: The White Treasury
rooms.description:
You are standing in the treasury of the White Court.  Hopefully no one 
has looted the Crown's treasure.

exits.exit_description: A small staircase rises above you.
